title: Python T-Shirt Distribution System
short: A Python-based distribution system for T-shirt orders and inventory handling.
details: Built with a focus on reliability and simple CLI/automation workflows. Handles order intake, inventory updates, and batch processing for shipments.

title: Inventory Tracker Streamlit
short: An inventory tracker built with Streamlit for quick dashboards and CRUD operations.
details: Includes CSV import/export, simple analytics, and interactive dashboards for monitoring stock and transactions.

title: Video Editing Work
short: Five years of video editing experience across client and personal projects.
details: Skills include color grading, motion graphics, and efficient workflow pipelines; portfolio includes short clips and long-form edits.

title: Python Calculator App
short: A lightweight calculator application implemented in Python with a clean UI.
details: Extensible operations and a simple interface; useful as a learning project and small utility.

title: Cycling Application
short: A cycling app for route planning, tracking, and automated logging.
details: Integrates Leaflet, Google Maps, OSMaps, vehicle number recognition APIs, and OpenAI Whisper for voice features.

title: Blender 3D Work
short: 3D design and animation work created in Blender.
details: Three completed courses and five years of practice; projects include modeling, texturing, and basic animation.

title: HTML Fundamentals Website
short: A fundamentals website teaching HTML basics.
details: A milestone learning project; the site is not currently online but demonstrates core HTML concepts and examples.
